info.author: Dmitry Borisov
classifiers: License :: OSI Approved :: GNU Library or Lesser General Public License (LGPL)
Topic :: Multimedia :: Sound/Audio :: CD Audio :: CD Playing
Topic :: Multimedia :: Sound/Audio :: CD Audio :: CD Ripping
info.description:
A multimedia processing module which makes possible video/audio
manipulation directly from Python.
It understands the following formats: avi, mpg, mp3, ogg, aac, ac3, vob, cda
etc. Take a look at some examples: http://www.pymedia.org/tut/
info.keywords: mp3 ogg wma ac3 aac avi mpeg dvd cdda fft
info.name: PyMedia
info.summary: PyMedia is a module/library for manipulating mp3, avi, ogg, divx, mpeg, dvd media files
info.html_description: A multimedia processing module which makes possible video/audio manipulation directly from Python. It understands the following formats: avi, mpg, mp3, ogg, aac, ac3, vob, cda etc. Take a look at some examples: http://www.pymedia.org/tut/
